scripts.first-deploy: npm install --production=false && npm run migrate-latest && psql $DATABASE_URL -f database/scripts/001-load-establishments_epci.sql -v filePath=database/data/common/epci.csv && psql $DATABASE_URL -f database/scripts/002-load-establishments_commune.sql -v filePath=database/data/common/commune.csv && psql $DATABASE_URL -f database/scripts/003-load-establishments_direction_territoriale.sql -v filePath=database/data/common/direction_territoriale.csv && psql $DATABASE_URL -f database/scripts/004-load-data.sql -v filePath=database/data/dummy/dummy_data.csv -v dateFormat="'MM/DD/YY'" && psql $DATABASE_URL -f database/scripts/006-load-locality-taxes.sql -v filePath=database/data/common/taxe.csv && npm run seed
